channel.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
channel.description:
I have a nickel, you have a dime. The nickel is worth more. Why might this be?
The answer can be anyone's speculation. The answer to this riddle might not even exist. But if it does, i'll let you know ;D

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @Congruent Congruent
item.description:
@Congruent wrote:

I haven’t read any responses so one possibility is that the nickel and dime are in different currency (different countries) where the exchange rate allows for the nickel to be worth more than a dime. Since this is purely a speculative riddle, I’d be interested to read what the other responses were after I post this.

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

The nickel has two types of value. One is sentimental, the other is monetary. The dime has only a monetary value; the nickel is more valuable.

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:23, topic:518038”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=636300.msg4291739#msg4291739 date=1367418519]

So wouldn’t it make sense to trade in all your money for nickels and melt them down?

Illegal in the UK
[/quote]
and the US[/quote]

And the Netherlands

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:15, topic:518038”]So wouldn’t it make sense to trade in all your money for nickels and melt them down?

I know where I live, they don’t make them from nickel anymore. or at least there is a mixture of nickel and something cheap. We recently got rid of the penny also.[/quote]
Where I live the copper in one pence and two pence coins is valued more than the money value o;.

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:19, topic:518038”][quote author=MooningPanda link=topic=636300.msg4289880#msg4289880 date=1367045421]
The answer can be anyone’s speculation.
The answer to this riddle might not even exist.
But if it does, i’ll let you know ;D
[/quote]
I’d say you don’t know an answer and are waiting for someone to say something smart and claim that it’s what the answer is. Or you have an answer and it is completely stupid and horribly thought out.

In other words

[quote author=Lin link=topic=636300.msg4291650#msg4291650 date=1367381759]
This is not a riddle. It’s the shittiest excuse for one.
[/quote][/quote]
whoa, +1

Read full topic

The answer to this riddle might not even exist.
But if it does, i’ll let you know ;D[/quote]
I’d say you don’t know an answer and are waiting for someone to say something smart and claim that it’s what the answer is. Or you have an answer and it is completely stupid and horribly thought out.

In other words

Lin:

This is not a riddle. It’s the shittiest excuse for one.

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

This is not a riddle. It’s the shittiest excuse for one. There are an infinite number of answers.

Maybe the dime is fake. The nickel could be covered in gold. The nickel could have belonged to someone famous or had their autograph on it. … I really wish you thought before you posted.

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The nickel is worth more because you believe it is worth more.

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

A nickel is heavier than a dime
A nickel is large but not too large more so than a dime
A nickel has a thicker circulatory ring
A nickel (the older ones…) have more of an “imprint” that is “thicker” than a dime.

All I could think of

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

So wouldn’t it make sense to trade in all your money for nickels and melt them down?

I know where I live, they don’t make them from nickel anymore. or at least there is a mixture of nickel and something cheap. We recently got rid of the penny also.

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

So, basically the OP is saying the reason a nickel is worth more then a dime is because of its production costs but still believes there is a more in depth answer? Odd.

It wouldn’t be based off the amount produced of each coin would it? why it is worth more that is…

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Because if I gave you a nickel, you’d have to tickle my pickle, but if I gave you a dime, it’d be a waste of time. :3

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I don’t see how this is a riddle.

Nickel most probably is rarer or has more uses than whatever metal dime is made out of or at worst everyone believes it’s worth more making it worth more when in reality without being told it’s worth more it’s worthless or of equal value.

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

The nickel is dank, whereas the dime is bush. Lol only thing I can think of.

But who in their right mind would sell a nick of dank… o.0

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @MooningPanda MooningPanda
item.description:
@MooningPanda wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:8, topic:518038”]Dear OP,

There is a nickel in front of me. My eyes have been fixated on it with such contempt and or lack thereof. After observing this nickle and your riddle,

I’ve become detached from myself and I’m no longer capable of learning and observing you or the nickel. You cannot ask me to switch this off for I am incapable of such a feat. Because of you I no longer feel or sense anything. I keep asking myself over and over if only you knew, maybe you wouldn’t have to ask and post. The answer you seek is stupid, worthless and paltry.

These feelings that arise in me I cannot; [i]will not[/i] control. All the time I read topics on this website and I can't help but think to myself...why? Why am I here reading this. I don't care what you have to say or what you think is worthy of an intellectual discussion. How can I trust you to find where this nickel belongs? Should I care at all that you are completely and utterly wasting your time with your nickel. Let me tell you something. You are nothing to me, never will you exist or bother me or affect me. So in essence I find myself writing this post to myself in reflection of you because you simply cannot understand that no one cares.

I don't want anything bad to happen to you, but sometime's I drop nickels from high places in a matter of speaking. Incredibly high places where the sun hides away for so long. Sometimes the nickels hit things. The nickels hurt. The nickels hurt. The nickels know. They know that they weigh more than 5 grams. It took 50 nickels only 50. That's how many you need to drop. Together. At least to ensure what you need to do. YOU TELL ME NOW. YOU KNOW I'VE SEEN IT. Alas, I stray from the point and my vision wanes and my mind continues to interpret. I don't want you to understand or see. You can't, you won't. But if you do I'll let you know.

I will no longer see topic's like these. I've seen my fair share of people coming and going who seize all they can from this site. AND WHAT DO WE GET IN RETURN I ASK. DARE I ASK OP WHAT WE GET IN RETURN FOR THESE TOPICS. Good, decent and intelligence post, topics, ideas, feelings and emotion are dragged down into obscurity. I know how to do it OP. Get away from me. GET AWAY. My visions blurring and yet you and your deplorable information remains to be seen. Remains for all who seek such turmoil. Over such petty circumstances. I hope you understand where I am coming from because if you don't...well...I can't say such words. 

If you don't enlighten us we cannot help you. Don't fret over it because we can all notice it. And those who do nothing say nothing. When your nickel is wrong and all you have left prevails you. When your nickel is gone and all you can think of abandons your mind. When your nickel belongs and all you see ails you. Now your nickel is gone and everything I have said will refine you; define you. You think your smart? Your not. It's plain to see. I make no promises to you or threats. Full-stop.

Why don't you ever stop. I'm dying. Your killing me. Slowly you are malignant to this site. Don't you see what you are doing. Do you not see it? DO YOU NOT! PLEASE TELL ME YOU SEE IT. Please tell me, just tell me how in your world, your awareness of your surroundings, the sensations you feel, how you can post something like this. Don't lie to me. DON'T loveING LIE TO ME. If you do everyone will see your lie and those who don't I will let them know of you. Do not do this again. If you care at all about this forum and her people do not do this again. Your dribble has become my problem and I beg you please to let it go. Just let it go and don't do it. Again I find myself fixated. Your nickel OP is worthless but only because you have made it so. Every time you see a nickel you remember this. DO YOU UNDERSTAND. WHEN YOU SEE A NICKEL YOU [i]WILL[/i] THINK OF THIS POST. YOU WILL REGRET YOUR WORTHLESS ACTION. YOU REGRET YOUR WORTHLESS NICKEL.[/quote]

Good lord you over-contemplated that.

Read full topic

Together. At least to ensure what you need to do. YOU TELL ME NOW. YOU KNOW I'VE SEEN IT. Alas, I stray from the point and my vision wanes and my mind continues to interpret. I don't want you to understand or see. You can't, you won't. But if you do I'll let you know.

I will no longer see topic's like these. I've seen my fair share of people coming and going who seize all they can from this site. AND WHAT DO WE GET IN RETURN I ASK. DARE I ASK OP WHAT WE GET IN RETURN FOR THESE TOPICS. Good, decent and intelligence post, topics, ideas, feelings and emotion are dragged down into obscurity. I know how to do it OP. Get away from me. GET AWAY. My visions blurring and yet you and your deplorable information remains to be seen. Remains for all who seek such turmoil. Over such petty circumstances. I hope you understand where I am coming from because if you don't...well...I can't say such words. 

If you don't enlighten us we cannot help you. Don't fret over it because we can all notice it. And those who do nothing say nothing. When your nickel is wrong and all you have left prevails you. When your nickel is gone and all you can think of abandons your mind. When your nickel belongs and all you see ails you. Now your nickel is gone and everything I have said will refine you; define you. You think your smart? Your not. It's plain to see. I make no promises to you or threats. Full-stop.

Why don't you ever stop. I'm dying. Your killing me. Slowly you are malignant to this site. Don't you see what you are doing. Do you not see it? DO YOU NOT! PLEASE TELL ME YOU SEE IT. Please tell me, just tell me how in your world, your awareness of your surroundings, the sensations you feel, how you can post something like this. Don't lie to me. DON'T loveING LIE TO ME. If you do everyone will see your lie and those who don't I will let them know of you. Do not do this again. If you care at all about this forum and her people do not do this again. Your dribble has become my problem and I beg you please to let it go. Just let it go and don't do it. Again I find myself fixated. Your nickel OP is worthless but only because you have made it so. Every time you see a nickel you remember this. DO YOU UNDERSTAND. WHEN YOU SEE A NICKEL YOU [i]WILL[/i] THINK OF THIS POST. YOU WILL REGRET YOUR WORTHLESS ACTION. YOU REGRET YOUR WORTHLESS NICKEL.

Read full topic

item.title: Riddle: I have a nickel
item.dc:creator: @MooningPanda MooningPanda
item.description:
@MooningPanda wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:3, topic:518038”]isnt the stuff nickel made out of worth more
AKA NICKEL[/quote]
http://www.9news.com/news/local/story.aspx?storyid=68669&catid=222
that actually helped me think up this riddle, but it has a deeper more concentrated meaning within this nickel more than a dime story.

drubrkletern:

tom wins

actually tom gave an example of why a nickel should be worth less than a dime. so all-in-all his answer is pointless, that is unless you like nickelback, which hey that’s your thing, whoopie!
